be used with ERC1967Proxy","events":{"AdminChanged(address,address)":{"details":"Emitted when the admin account has changed."},"Approved(bytes32)":{"params":{"receiptId":"Receipt that got approved"}},"BeaconUpgraded(address)":{"details":"Emitted when the beacon is changed."},"Initialized(uint8)":{"details":"Triggered when the contract has been initialized or reinitialized."},"OutgoingReceipt(uint256,bytes32)":{"params":{"amount":"Amount of token burned","substrateRecipient":"Who should get tokens on substrate"}},"Processed(bytes32)":{"params":{"receiptId":"subject Receipt"}},"RoleAdminChanged(bytes32,bytes32,bytes32)":{"details":"Emitted when `newAdminRole` is set as ``role``'s admin role, replacing `previousAdminRole` `DEFAULT_ADMIN_ROLE` is the starting admin for all roles, despite {RoleAdminChanged} not being emitted signaling this. _Available since v3.1._"},"RoleGranted(bytes32,address,address)":{"details":"Emitted when `account` is granted `role`. `sender` is the account that originated the contract call, an admin role bearer except when using {AccessControl-_setupRole}."},"RoleRevoked(bytes32,address,address)":{"details":"Emitted when `account` is revoked `role`. `sender` is the account that originated the contract call:   - if using `revokeRole`, it is the admin role bearer   - if using `renounceRole`, it is the role bearer (i.e. `account`)"},"StateChanged(bool)":{"params":{"newBridgeState":"New bridge state"}},"Upgraded(address)":{"details":"Emitted when the implementation is upgraded."},"Vote(bytes32,address,uint64)":{"params":{"receiptId":"subject Receipt","relay":"Relay that cast the vote"}}},"kind":"dev","methods":{"burn(uint256,bytes32)":{"details":"Reverts with `BridgeInactive` if bridge is inactiveReverts with if bridge is not approved to manage funds or if caller has      insufficient balanceEmits `OutgoingReceipt(amount, substrateRecipient)` on successInteracts with `token` contract","params":{"amount":"Amount of token to burn (a.k.a. transfer to substrate).","substrateRecipient":"AccountId on substrate side that will receive                           funds"}},"claimReward()":{"details":"May revert with EthTransferFailed"},"emergencyStop()":{"details":"Only addresses with ADMIN_ROLE can call thisEmits `StateChanged(active)` if state actually changedAlways emits `EmergencyStop()`"},"getRoleAdmin(bytes32)":{"details":"Returns the admin role that controls `role`. See {grantRole} and {revokeRole}. To change a role's admin, use {_setRoleAdmin}."},"grantRole(bytes32,address)":{"details":"Reverts with `Unauthorized()` if caller doesn't have correct role for      action","params":{"account":"Account to grant the role to","role":"Role to grant"}},"hasRole(bytes32,address)":{"details":"Returns `true` if `account` has been granted `role`."},"initialize(address,uint32,uint256,uint256,uint256,uint256,uint256)":{"params":{"counterLimit":"initial `rateLimit.counterLimit`","decayRate":"initial `rateLimit.decayRate`","fee_":"initial `votesRequired`","mintDelay_":"initial `votesRequired`","supplyLimit_":"initial `supplyLimit`","token_":"Address of ERC20 token to manage","votesRequired_":"initial `votesRequired`"}},"mint(bytes32)":{"details":"Reverts with `BridgeInactive` if bridge is inactiveReverts with `AlreadyProcessed` if receipt was already processedReverts with `NotApproved` if receipt isn't approved by relaysReverts with `TooSoon` if `mintDelay` blocks didn't pass since      approvalReverts with `TooMuchSupply` if there's too many tokens in      circulationReverts with `RateLimited` if there's too many tokens minted in      short timeReverts with `InsufficientEther` if not enough ether was sentEmits `Processed(receiptId)` on successInteracts with `token` contract","params":{"receiptId":"Receipt"}},"proxiableUUID()":{"details":"Implementation of the ERC1822 {proxiableUUID} function. This returns the storage slot used by the implementation. It is used to validate the implementation's compatibility when performing an upgrade. IMPORTANT: A proxy pointing at a proxiable contract should not be considered proxiable itself, because this risks bricking a proxy that upgrades to it, by delegating to itself until out of gas. Thus it is critical that this function revert if invoked through a proxy. This is guaranteed by the `notDelegated` modifier."},"renounceRole(bytes32,address)":{"details":"Revokes `role` from the calling account. Roles are often managed via {grantRole} and {revokeRole}: this function's purpose is to provide a mechanism for accounts to lose their privileges if they are compromised (such as when a trusted device is misplaced). If the calling account had been revoked `role`, emits a {RoleRevoked} event. Requirements: - the caller must be `account`. May emit a {RoleRevoked} event."},"revokeRole(bytes32,address)":{"details":"Reverts with `Unauthorized()` if caller doesn't have correct role for      action","params":{"account":"Account to remove the role from","role":"Role to remove"}},"setActive(bool)":{"details":"Only addresses with ADMIN_ROLE can call thisReverts with `InvalidArgument` if `votesRequired_` is 0Reverts with `InvalidConfiguration` if `token` is ` and `active` is      trueEmits `StateChanged(active)` if state actually changedInteracts with `token` contract","params":{"active":"True to start, False to stop"}},"setFee(uint256)":{"details":"Only addresses with ADMIN_ROLE can call this","params":{"fee_":"New minting fee"}},"setMintDelay(uint256)":{"details":"Only addresses with SUPER_ADMIN_ROLE can call this","params":{"delay":"New minting delay"}},"setRateLimit(uint256,uint256)":{"details":"Only addresses with SUPER_ADMIN_ROLE can call this","params":{"counterLimit":"New counter limit (max burst mint)","decayRate":"New decay rate (avg mint per block)"}},"setSupplyLimit(uint256)":{"details":"Only addresses with SUPER_ADMIN_ROLE can call this","params":{"supplyLimit_":"new supply limit"}},"setVotesRequired(uint32)":{"details":"Only addresses with SUPER_ADMIN_ROLE can call thisReverts with `InvalidArgument` if `votesRequired_` is 0","params":{"votesRequired_":"Number of votes required"}},"supportsInterface(bytes4)":{"details":"See {IERC165-supportsInterface}."},"transferTokenOwnership(address)":{"details":"Only addresses with SUPER_ADMIN_ROLE can call thisInteracts with `token` contract","params":{"newOwner":"new owner"}},"upgradeTo(address)":{"details":"Upgrade the implementation of the proxy to `newImplementation`. Calls {_authorizeUpgrade}. Emits an {Upgraded} event."},"upgradeToAndCall(address,bytes)":{"details":"Upgrade the implementation of the proxy to `newImplementation`, and subsequently execute the function call encoded in `data`. Calls {_authorizeUpgrade}. Emits an {Upgraded} event."},"voteMint(bytes32,uint64,uint256,address)":{"details":"Only addresses with RELAY_ROLE can call thisReverts with `BridgeInactive` if bridge is inactiveReverts with `InvalidArgument` if `substrateBlockNumber` is 0Reverts with `AlreadyProcessed` if receipt was already fully processedWill stop the bridge if details for this receiptId don't match      details relayed by other relaysReverts with `AlreadyVoted()` if this relay already voted.Emits `Approved(receiptId)` if this vote caused reaching      `votesRequired`Emits `Vote(receiptId, msg.sender)` on success","params":{"amount":"Amount being transfered","ethRecipient":"Ethereum address of token recipient","receiptId":"Incoming receipt id.","substrateBlockNumber":"Substrate block number on which Receipt was                             created."}}},"title":"Substrate <-> ETH bridge for Liberland","version":1},"userdoc":{"errors":{"AlreadyProcessed()":[{"notice":"IncomingReceipt was already processed and tokens were minted"}],"AlreadyVoted()":[{"notice":"This relay already voted for this ReceiptId"}],"BridgeInactive()":[{"notice":"Bridge is deactivated - see `bridgeActive()` and `setActive(bool)`"}],"EthTransferFailed()":[{"notice":"Eth transfer failed when redeeming reward"}],"InsufficientEther()":[{"notice":"Insufficient ether was sent - see `fee()`"}],"InvalidArgument()":[{"notice":"Invalid argument"}],"InvalidConfiguration()":[{"notice":"Invalid bridge configuration"}],"NotApproved()":[{"notice":"IncomingReceipt wasn't approved for minting yet"}],"RateLimited()":[{"notice":"Too much is being minted by the bridge at the moment, try again later"}],"TooMuchSupply()":[{"notice":"Total supply limit was reached - try again later"}],"TooSoon()":[{"notice":"IncomingReceipt was approved, but `mintDelay` blocks didn't pass yet"}],"Unauthorized()":[{"notice":"Caller is not authorized for this call"}]},"events":{"Approved(bytes32)":{"notice":"An IncomingReceipt was approved for transfer. `mint(bytes32)` can now be called for this receipt after `mintDelay` blocks pass."},"EmergencyStop()":{"notice":"Bridge was emergency stopped by watcher - misbehavior by relay was detected"},"OutgoingReceipt(uint256,bytes32)":{"notice":"Emitted after burn, notifies relays that transfer is happening"},"Processed(bytes32)":{"notice":"IncomingReceipt was completely processed - tokens were minted"},"StateChanged(bool)":{"notice":"Bridge get activated or deactivated"},"Vote(bytes32,address,uint64)":{"notice":"Vote was cast to approve IncomingReceipt"}},"kind":"user","methods":{"ADMIN_ROLE()":{"notice":"Role that's allowed to: * add and remove admins * add watchers * remove relays * setFee * setActive"},"RELAY_ROLE()":{"notice":"Role that's allowed to voteMint"},"SUPER_ADMIN_ROLE()":{"notice":"Role that's allowed to: * grant and revoke all roles * setVotesRequired * setMintDelay * setRateLimit * setSupplyLimit * transferTokenOwnership"},"UPGRADER_ROLE()":{"notice":"Role that's allowed to upgrade the contract"},"WATCHER_ROLE()":{"notice":"Role thats allowed to emergencyStop"},"bridgeActive()":{"notice":"If false, burning, voting, minting is disabled"},"burn(uint256,bytes32)":{"notice":"Burn token and get receipt in return. This is the entrypoint for users to start ETH -> Substrate transfer."},"claimReward()":{"notice":"Claim pending reward Used by relays to get ether collected from users as minting fees."},"emergencyStop()":{"notice":"Emergency stop - stops the bridge"},"fee()":{"notice":"Fee that must be sent on `mint()` and is distributed to voters"},"grantRole(bytes32,address)":{"notice":"Adding special users. See role docs on info who can grant each role"},"incomingReceipts(bytes32)":{"notice":"Incoming Receipts - Substrate -> ETH transfers"},"initialize(address,uint32,uint256,uint256,uint256,uint256,uint256)":{"notice":"Initializer, should be called in the same tx as deployment"},"mint(bytes32)":{"notice":"Mint tokens according to the receipt. Receipt must already be relayed and approved by relays. This is payable and requires sending at least `fee()` ether."},"mintCounter()":{"notice":"Counter for enforcing rate limit"},"mintDelay()":{"notice":"Delay in blocks between approval and allowing `mint()`"},"pendingRewards(address)":{"notice":"Rewards for relays that can be claimed with `claimReward`"},"rateLimit()":{"notice":"Rate limit configuration"},"revokeRole(bytes32,address)":{"notice":"Removing special users. See role docs on info who can remove each role"},"setActive(bool)":{"notice":"Stop/start bridge. Will also pause/unpause the token accordingly."},"setFee(uint256)":{"notice":"Set the minting fee"},"setMintDelay(uint256)":{"notice":"Set the minting delay"},"setRateLimit(uint256,uint256)":{"notice":"Set rate limit parameters"},"setSupplyLimit(uint256)":{"notice":"Set max circulating token supply"},"setVotesRequired(uint32)":{"notice":"Set the number of votes required to approve minting"},"supplyLimit()":{"notice":"Maximum amount of tokens in circulation"},"token()":{"notice":"Address of token that will be minted/burned"},"transferTokenOwnership(address)":{"notice":"Transfer ownership of underlying token contract. Will stop the bridge and set the token address to 0, effectively bricking the bridge."},"voteMint(bytes32,uint64,uint256,address)":{"notice":"Vote for approval of given receipt. This is the call used by relays to relay Substrate -> ETH transfers."},"votes(bytes32,uint256)":{"notice":"Votes for approving given receipt"},"votesRequired()":{"notice":"Number of votes required to ":{"keccak256":"0xf0018c2440fbe238dd3a8732fa8e17a0f9dce84d31451dc8a32f6d62b349c9f1","license":"MIT","urls":["bzz-raw://59e1c62884d55b70f3ae5432b44bb3166ad71ae3acd19c57ab6ddc3c87c325ee","dweb:/ipfs/QmezuXg5GK5oeA4F91EZhozBFekhq5TD966bHPH18cCqhu"]},"lib/openzeppelin-contracts/contracts/utils/Strings.sol":{"keccak256":"0xa4d1d62251f8574deb032a35fc948386a9b4de74b812d4f545a1ac120486b48a","license":"MIT","urls":["bzz-raw://8c969013129ba9e651a20735ef659fef6d8a1139ea3607bd4b26ddea2d645634","dweb:/ipfs/QmVhVa6LGuzAcB8qgDtVHRkucn4ihj5UZr8xBLcJkP6ucb"]},"lib/openzeppelin-contracts/contracts/utils/cryptography/ECDSA.sol":{"keccak256":"0xda898fa084aa1ddfdb346e6a40459e00a59d87071cce7c315a46d648dd71d0ba","license":"MIT","urls":["bzz-raw://ce501a941f4aa1555c04dabb5e07992503bb6a9b32ff8f7cdcefdb4a742210cb","dweb:/ipfs/QmeScPrUpdrGYs9BytV3Z5ZWJcBXtuAgCW4BLHua4xFUxx"]},"lib/openzeppelin-contracts/contracts/utils/cryptography/EIP712.sol":{"keccak256":"0x948d8b2d18f38141ec78c5229d770d950ebc781ed3f44cc9e3ccbb9fded5846a","license":"MIT","urls":["bzz-raw://7311ac950ed2d81f3ccf1784a926efbfc82a86dcb5c98d41eb3792c0cac63a2f","dweb:/ipfs/QmRRwCUHewkPmehx8QRYENFoWyLNx8UEZGULxWYUeSZdTS"]},"lib/openzeppelin-contracts/contracts/utils/math/Math.sol":{"keccak256":"0xa1e8e83cd0087785df04ac79fb395d9f3684caeaf973d9e2c71caef723a3a5d6","license":"MIT","urls":["bzz-raw://33bbf48cc069be677705037ba7520c22b1b622c23b33e1a71495f2d36549d40b","dweb:/ipfs/Qmct36zWXv3j7LZB83uwbg7TXwnZSN1fqHNDZ93GG98bGz"]},"src/Bridge.sol":{"keccak256":"0xa46dbb22586140a92673f880713a6220968315637d78b2d34989d632c509f7a0","license":"MIT","urls":["bzz-raw://f11f9f5a4f72ce021a1416f995edbdb3546c63eb81eb514a501dabc50a0994ac","dweb:/ipfs/QmVFHZHnmjoRpsBP1Rr7RuXdoisB46UPNYjjCdELLgptnS"]},"src/WrappedToken.sol":{"keccak256":"0xd2416772c5b811284bd3f2dbd6950c57a02c7815eef06451bfb6cb166fd282ad","license":"MIT","urls":["bzz-raw://926b821c49e4249b0b227f01509ff2a54b19f8c1c6c73babf50fd14d57edb9b4","dweb:/ipfs/QmfGBq5YN3jdpQ8KptWZnE5AGuxrS6WJQ2k6s2rP burn(uint256,bytes32).details: Reverts with `BridgeInactive` if bridge is inactiveReverts with if bridge is not approved to manage funds or if caller has      insufficient balanceEmits `OutgoingReceipt(amount, substrateRecipient)` on successInteracts with `token` contract

params.amount: Amount of token to burn (a.k.a. transfer to substrate).
params.substrateRecipient: AccountId on substrate side that will receive                           funds

emergencyStop().details: Only addresses with ADMIN_ROLE can call thisEmits `StateChanged(active)` if state actually changedAlways emits `EmergencyStop()`

getRoleAdmin(bytes32).details: Returns the admin role that controls `role`. See {grantRole} and {revokeRole}. To change a role's admin, use {_setRoleAdmin}.

grantRole(bytes32,address).details: Reverts with `Unauthorized()` if caller doesn't have correct role for      action

params.account: Account to grant the role to

params.token_: Address of ERC20 token to manage

mint(bytes32).details: Reverts with `BridgeInactive` if bridge is inactiveReverts with `AlreadyProcessed` if receipt was already processedReverts with `NotApproved` if receipt isn't approved by relaysReverts with `TooSoon` if `mintDelay` blocks didn't pass since      approvalReverts with `TooMuchSupply` if there's too many tokens in      circulationReverts with `RateLimited` if there's too many tokens minted in      short timeReverts with `InsufficientEther` if not enough ether was sentEmits `Processed(receiptId)` on successInteracts with `token` contract

proxiableUUID().details: Implementation of the ERC1822 {proxiableUUID} function. This returns the storage slot used by the implementation. It is used to validate the implementation's compatibility when performing an upgrade. IMPORTANT: A proxy pointing at a proxiable contract should not be considered proxiable itself, because this risks bricking a proxy that upgrades to it, by delegating to itself until out of gas. Thus it is critical that this function revert if invoked through a proxy. This is guaranteed by the `notDelegated` modifier.

renounceRole(bytes32,address).details: Revokes `role` from the calling account. Roles are often managed via {grantRole} and {revokeRole}: this function's purpose is to provide a mechanism for accounts to lose their privileges if they are compromised (such as when a trusted device is misplaced). If the calling account had been revoked `role`, emits a {RoleRevoked} event. Requirements: - the caller must be `account`. May emit a {RoleRevoked} event.

revokeRole(bytes32,address).details: Reverts with `Unauthorized()` if caller doesn't have correct role for      action

params.account: Account to remove the role from

setActive(bool).details: Only addresses with ADMIN_ROLE can call thisReverts with `InvalidArgument` if `votesRequired_` is 0Reverts with `InvalidConfiguration` if `token` is ` and `active` is      trueEmits `StateChanged(active)` if state actually changedInteracts with `token` contract

params.active: True to start, False to stop

setFee(uint256).details: Only addresses with ADMIN_ROLE can call this

setMintDelay(uint256).details: Only addresses with SUPER_ADMIN_ROLE can call this

setRateLimit(uint256,uint256).details: Only addresses with SUPER_ADMIN_ROLE can call this

params.decayRate: New decay rate (avg mint per block)

setSupplyLimit(uint256).details: Only addresses with SUPER_ADMIN_ROLE can call this

setVotesRequired(uint32).details: Only addresses with SUPER_ADMIN_ROLE can call thisReverts with `InvalidArgument` if `votesRequired_` is 0

transferTokenOwnership(address).details: Only addresses with SUPER_ADMIN_ROLE can call thisInteracts with `token` contract

upgradeTo(address).details: Upgrade the implementation of the proxy to `newImplementation`. Calls {_authorizeUpgrade}. Emits an {Upgraded} event.

upgradeToAndCall(address,bytes).details: Upgrade the implementation of the proxy to `newImplementation`, and subsequently execute the function call encoded in `data`. Calls {_authorizeUpgrade}. Emits an {Upgraded} event.

voteMint(bytes32,uint64,uint256,address).details: Only addresses with RELAY_ROLE can call thisReverts with `BridgeInactive` if bridge is inactiveReverts with `InvalidArgument` if `substrateBlockNumber` is 0Reverts with `AlreadyProcessed` if receipt was already fully processedWill stop the bridge if details for this receiptId don't match      details relayed by other relaysReverts with `AlreadyVoted()` if this relay already voted.Emits `Approved(receiptId)` if this vote caused reaching      `votesRequired`Emits `Vote(receiptId, msg.sender)` on success

params.substrateBlockNumber: Substrate block number on which Receipt was                             created.

ADMIN_ROLE().notice: Role that's allowed to: * add and remove admins * add watchers * remove relays * setFee * setActive

SUPER_ADMIN_ROLE().notice: Role that's allowed to: * grant and revoke all roles * setVotesRequired * setMintDelay * setRateLimit * setSupplyLimit * transferTokenOwnership

UPGRADER_ROLE().notice: Role that's allowed to upgrade the contract

bridgeActive().notice: If false, burning, voting, minting is disabled

burn(uint256,bytes32).notice: Burn token and get receipt in return. This is the entrypoint for users to start ETH -> Substrate transfer.

claimReward().notice: Claim pending reward Used by relays to get ether collected from users as minting fees.

fee().notice: Fee that must be sent on `mint()` and is distributed to voters

grantRole(bytes32,address).notice: Adding special users. See role docs on info who can grant each role

initialize(address,uint32,uint256,uint25.notice: Initializer, should be called in the same tx as deployment

mint(bytes32).notice: Mint tokens according to the receipt. Receipt must already be relayed and approved by relays. This is payable and requires sending at least `fee()` ether.

mintDelay().notice: Delay in blocks between approval and allowing `mint()`

pendingRewards(address).notice: Rewards for relays that can be claimed with `claimReward`

revokeRole(bytes32,address).notice: Removing special users. See role docs on info who can remove each role

setActive(bool).notice: Stop/start bridge. Will also pause/unpause the token accordingly.

setVotesRequired(uint32).notice: Set the number of votes required to approve minting

supplyLimit().notice: Maximum amount of tokens in circulation

token().notice: Address of token that will be minted/burned

transferTokenOwnership(address).notice: Transfer ownership of underlying token contract. Will stop the bridge and set the token address to 0, effectively bricking the bridge.

voteMint(bytes32,uint64,uint256,address).notice: Vote for approval of given receipt. This is the call used by relays to relay Substrate -> ETH transfers.

votesRequired().notice: Number of votes required to approve IncomingReceipt

documentation.text: Bridge is deactivated - see `bridgeActive()` and `setActive(bool)`
IncomingReceipt was already processed and tokens were minted
IncomingReceipt wasn't approved for minting yet
IncomingReceipt was approved, but `mintDelay` blocks didn't pass yet
Insufficient ether was sent - see `fee()`
Too much is being minted by the bridge at the moment, try again later
Eth transfer failed when redeeming reward
Caller is not authorized for this call
Total supply limit was reached - try again later
Invalid argument
Invalid bridge configuration
This relay already voted for this ReceiptId

Bridge get activated or deactivated
 @param newBridgeState New bridge state

IncomingReceipt was completely processed - tokens were minted
 @param receiptId subject Receipt

Bridge was emergency stopped by watcher - misbehavior by relay was
 detected
@title Interface with events emitted by the bridge

Role that's allowed to:
 * grant and revoke all roles
 * setVotesRequired
 * setMintDelay
 * setRateLimit
 * setSupplyLimit
 * transferTokenOwnership

Role that's allowed to:
 * add and remove admins
 * add watchers
 * remove relays
 * setFee
 * setActive
Role that's allowed to voteMint
Role thats allowed to emergencyStop
Role that's allowed to upgrade the contract
If false, burning, voting, minting is disabled
Number of votes required to approve IncomingReceipt
Fee that must be sent on `mint()` and is distributed to voters
Delay in blocks between approval and allowing `mint()`
Maximum amount of tokens in circulation
Address of token that will be minted/burned
Incoming Receipts - Substrate -> ETH transfers
Votes for approving given receipt
Rewards for relays that can be claimed with `claimReward`
Counter for enforcing rate limit
Rate limit configuration

@title Substrate <-> ETH bridge for Liberland
 @dev Must be used with ERC1967Proxy
